notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription:
Graph the line of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>y</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>2</mn>
    <mn>3</mn>
  </mfrac>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">y = \frac{2}{3}x + 1</annotation></semantics></math> using its slope and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>y</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">y</annotation></semantics></math>-intercept.
